#summary afterValidation(methods)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Register method(s) that should be called after an object is validated.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *methods* || string || true || - || Method name or list of method names ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<cfset afterValidation("fixCreditCard")>
}}}
